subject: Simsonn Plus X Pedal Not Connecting
description_text:
Hi team,

I had purchased Simsonn Plus X Pedals with the VAM Pro Linear Motors on
November 19, 2025 through your store on Aliexpress (Order
ID:8207000543300377).

It arrived a few days ago and I have set them up, but when I boot up the
Simsonn software, the pedals are not detected. I have tried countless ways
to try to troubleshoot, but nothing has worked.

I have tried to troubleshoot by doing the following:

   - Restarting my PC
   - Uninstalled/downloaded/redownloaded Simsonn Manager 2.0.9 and 2.1.2
   - Tried leaving the power supply for the VAM Pro unplugged and plugged
   - Tried different USB ports
   - Tried different USB cables

Nothing seems to be working and I suspect that it may be because of the
control box.

I don't wish to return the product as it is very high quality, so I am
hoping that the team can help me further troubleshoot the issue. Perhaps
send me a new control box to see if that fixes the issue and I can send the
old one back.

Thank you and please let me know if you have any questions.

Warm regards,

Jimmy

conversations.body_text:
Hi,

I am quickly following up to see if you had a chance to review my previous
email.

Thanks!

Hi Jimmy Phan,    Please follow the steps below to enter the upgrade process:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the main control box;    Reinsert the USB cable;    The software will prompt that it has entered “Simsonn Flasher Mode”;    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu to start the firmware update;    After the firmware update is complete, recalibrate the pedals and test them.

Hi,

I have pressed the button on the control box and reinserted the USB cable,
but my computer still doesn't recognize the device.

On Fri, Dec 5, 2025 at 10:45 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jimmy Phan,    You need to hold down the upgrade button and then reconnect the USB. This will put the device into recovery mode.

Hi,

I have held the button down while reconnecting the USB and my computer
still does not recognize the device. I have checked Device Manager, and it
doesn't appear there as a USB controller or anywhere else in the list.
